thread.title: Great beauchamps
thread.title_full: Great beauchamps - Review of Hotel Beauchamps, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: haleem1
title: Great beauchamps
text: This is my second stay at this hotel. The first time I stayed here was purely motivated by the great location, but when I arrived at the hotel I found out that the location is not the only great thing about this property. The staff were super friendly and the service was great. When I come to Paris, Hotel Beauchamps is where I will be staying.
